Name: Smutty Scrolls
About the game: Heyho, you funky sexy slime adventurer! Welcome to a mindbending erotic drag 'n drop puzzle adventure where you play three versions of yourself at the same time ! Multi-dimensional, booby, brainy goodness for adults! Brave slime Lim-Lim faces countless sexy adventures in mysterious fantasy worlds! His adventures have been recorded in the Smutty Scrolls... especially the lewd endings ! Wishlist Smutty Scrolls now ! You sexy little slime, you... üçÜ Meet your fantasy dates All girls are in love with Lim-Lim! What, didn't you know that girls love slimes? Princesses, witches, vampires, dragon girls and more are waiting for you! Stay Alive There are so many ways to die... Get eaten, roasted, sliced, eaten, burnt, squashed, and eaten! Try to find them all! Discover myriads of endings The flow of time is uncertain, and every story may have several possible endings. Unlock them all by changing the flow of your adventure on the fly! Play in different ways Some adventurers like a challenge, while some like to take it easy. Find your favorite game mode amongst all Smutty Scrolls. Is it Quest mode? Adventure Mode? Orgy mode? No matter which one you choose, all of them have lewd endings ;) Wishlist Smutty Scrolls now and start your sexy, slimey, seducing adventure! üíñ Stay funky, your Team Tailnut devs Dezue & OniGiri More Games Follow us on our Steam Developer page! / /
